description: Stores a chat message or text into Langflow tables or an external memory.

message.info: The chat message to be stored.

memory.info: The external memory to store the message. If empty, it will use the Langflow tables.

sender.info: The sender of the message. Might be Machine or User. If empty, the current sender parameter will be used.

sender_name.info: The name of the sender. Might be AI or User. If empty, the current sender parameter will be used.

session_id.info: The session ID of the chat. If empty, the current session ID parameter will be used.

success.external_memory_stored: Message stored in external memory for sender '{sender}' in session '{session_id}'
success.langflow_table_stored: Message stored in Langflow tables for sender '{sender}' in session '{session_id}'
success.message_stored: Message successfully stored for sender '{sender}' in session '{session_id}' (total messages: {total_messages})

errors.empty_message: Message is empty. Please provide a message to store.
errors.external_memory_failed: Failed to store message in external memory: {error}
errors.langflow_table_failed: Failed to store message in Langflow tables: {error}
errors.no_messages_stored: No messages were stored. Please ensure that the session ID and sender are properly set.
errors.unexpected_error: Unexpected error occurred while storing message: {error}
